revised_title: Investigating the Deviation of Pendulum Planes: Experiments at York
tldr: The author, John Phillips, conducts experiments at York to study the deviation of the plane of vibration of a pendulum from the meridional and other vertical planes. He observes the effects of various factors, such as the shape and weight of the pendulum, suspension materials, and the direction of motion, on the deviation and provides a detailed analysis of the results.
